summary: A small mod to hide the Aetherial Crown received from the Lost to the Ages quest.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][b]Hides the Aetherial Crown from showing on your character in third person.[/b][/size][/center]

[size=3]Are you one of many people who spend more than an healthy amount of time making your character look perfect? Do you love the buff of the Aetherial Crown but think its uglier than sin dipped in misery? Then this may be the mod for you. [/size]

[list]
[*]There is no switch or hotkey to turn it on or off. It's just always invisible.  
[*]It doesn't change the armor slot of the crown.
[*]It shouldn't have any mod conflicts.
[/list]

[size=3]Requires Dawnguard.[/size]

[size=3]Install with a mod installer or simply drop the esp into your Data folder and activate.[/size]
author: Seyon
